casebody.data:
Nies
v.
Town of Emerald Isle 409PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 3, 2016

J. David Breemer, Attorney at Law, Keith P. Anthony, Attorney at Law, Durham, For Nies, Gregory P., et al.

Brian E. Edes, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Norwood P. Blanchard, III, Attorney at Law, For Town of Emerald Isle.

Elliot M. Engstrom, Attorney at Law, For Civitas Institute Center for Law and Freedom.

Stephanie H. Autry, Attorney at Law, George B. Autry, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Robert H. Thomas, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, For Owners' Counsel of America, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of June 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of June 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 27th day of July 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
